system.note: Needs Exotic Weapon Training(Kursian Pit Weapons). Additional +10 to Parry Tests, if gaining 3+ DoS on parry test, can make Disarm Action on attacker as Free Action. Best Quality versions have the Tainted Quality.

description.value:
Special: Balanced

Note: Needs Exotic Weapon Training(Kursian Pit Weapons). Additional +10 to Parry Tests, if gaining 3+ DoS on parry test, can make Disarm Action on attacker as Free Action. Best Quality versions have the Tainted Quality.
